Accessibility

Distance 2D

The user’s mouse creates a gradient of circles that decrease in size the closer they are to the mouse as it moves across the screen

Move the mouse across the image to obscure and reveal the matrix. Measures the distance from the mouse to each circle and sets the size proportionally.

let max_distance;

function setup() {
  createCanvas(710, 400);
  noStroke();
  max_distance = dist(0, 0, width, height);
}

function draw() {
  background(0);

  for (let i = 0; i <= width; i += 20) {
    for (let j = 0; j <= height; j += 20) {
      let size = dist(mouseX, mouseY, i, j);
      size = (size / max_distance) * 66;
      ellipse(i, j, size, size);
    }
  }
}
